name: Cocham
culture_notes: Dialect: Coastal Tongues with Island Creole loanwords
Cuisine: salted fish, fermented seaweed stews
Custom: nightly tide-offerings at low tide
Festivals tied to star-calendar fishing moons
constraints: No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: Near-medieval to early-industrial tech; limited combustion industry
Localized ritual-labs central to local economy
State affiliation unknown; functions as a small frontier port
